resources.string: You acknowledge that you have read this Agreement and agree to all its terms and conditions. By accessing and using the Mobile Application and Services, you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the terms of this Agreement, you are not authorized to access or use the Mobile Application and Services.

If you create an account in the Mobile Application, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account and any other actions taken in connection with it. We may monitor and review new accounts before you may sign in and start using the Services. Providing false contact information of any kind may result in the termination of your account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized uses of your account or any other breaches of security. We will not be liable for any acts or omissions by you, including any damages of any kind incurred as a result of such acts or omissions. We may suspend, disable, or delete your account (or any part thereof) if we determine that you have violated any provision of this Agreement or that your conduct or content would tend to damage our reputation and goodwill. If we delete your account for the foregoing reasons, you may not re-register for our Services. We may block your email address and Internet protocol address to prevent further registration.
Are you certain you wish to remove %s?
Are you sure you want to delete %s?
Are you sure you want to leave Track Your Shot?
Deleting your pending account will require you to either register a new account or log in to an existing one. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting your pending account?
At least one player with at least one logged shot is required to generate a report. Please ensure this is completed to proceed.

We ask for camera permission so users can take photos with their phone\'s camera when creating or editing a player profile. This permission allows the app to access the device\'s camera hardware, enabling users to capture and associate images with their player profiles. Without this permission, the app would not be able to use the camera for this feature.
Camera permission has been denied. To manually grant permission for the camera and upload pictures for the Player, kindly navigate to Settings.

We reserve the right to modify this Agreement or its terms related to the Mobile Application and Services at any time at our discretion. When we do, we will send you an email to notify you. We may also provide notice to you in other ways at our discretion, such as through the contact information you have provided. An updated version of this Agreement will be effective immediately upon the posting of the revised Agreement unless otherwise specified. Your continued use of the Mobile Application and Services after the effective date of the revised Agreement (or such other act specified at that time) will constitute your consent to those changes.
Check if account has been verified
Choose a shot to log its information. To view additional details about the shot, click \"Show More\",
If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints regarding this Agreement, we encourage you to contact us with the email below:
Unable to delete the report due to an error. Please try again or reach out to support for assistance.
Unable to generate the report. Please try again or reach out to support for assistance.
Unable to upload the report for future use. Please try again or reach out to support for assistance.
Begin by creating a player profile, including details like first name, last name, position, and a player image.
Current account has not been verified please open email to verify account.
There haven\'t been any recent updates or modifications to the current player. Please make adjustments to the existing player to proceed.
The current shot has been updated. To see the latest information, click on the shot to view the updates.
There haven\'t been any recent updates or modifications to this shot. Please make adjustments to the existing shot to proceed.
Deleting this report will permanently prevent it from being downloaded in the future. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Device is currently not connected to internet. Please connect device to internet to complete action.
Do you wish to proceed despite having unsaved player modifications? Any changes made will not be saved.
This email is already in use on Track Your Shot. Please use a different email address.
Email has been sent to reset password. Please follow directions to reset password.
Email has been sent to verify account. Please open sent email to verify account.
Email is not in correct format. Please enter email in correct format
Email is required. Please enter a email to create a account.
Email is required. Please enter a email to login to existing account.
Email is required. Please enter a email to reset password for existing account.
Required information is missing to continue creating your account. Please provide the necessary details.
Having trouble creating your account. Please try again
Having trouble logging into your account. Please try again and or ensure credentials exist and are valid.
Having trouble resetting password for this account. Please try again and or ensure credentials exist and are valid.
Tap the "+" icon in the right-side toolbar to add a new player
Tap the "+" icon in the right-side toolbar to add a new report for a player
Press the "Log Shots" button to record shots for the player.
Press the "Log Shots" button to record shots for
Shots logged must be whole numbers. Please enter a whole number to log valid shots made or missed.

Leaving the app will result you in not finishing the account creation process. You will not be able to continue until you verify your email. If you verify your email and then come back to the app, you can continue to create your account.
This is a login image for the login screen
Choose the type of shot you want to record and input the makes and misses for the day the player took them.
Multiple fields are required that are not entered. Please enter all fields.
None of the players have any shots logged yet. Please log at least one shot for a player to generate a report.
No matching shot was found in your search. Please update search with existing shot name.
No players have been created for your account yet. Please create at least one player and record at least one shot to generate a report of shots taken by the player.
No Current Shots Logged For Player

Although the Mobile Application and Services may link to other resources (such as websites, mobile applications, etc.), we are not, directly or indirectly, implying any approval, association, sponsorship, endorsement, or affiliation with any linked resource, unless specifically stated herein. We are not responsible for examining or evaluating, and we do not warrant the offerings of, any businesses or individuals or the content of their resources. We do not assume any responsibility or liability for the actions, products, services, and content of any other third parties. You should carefully review the legal statements and other conditions of use of any resource which you access through a link in the Mobile Application. Your linking to any other off-site resources is at your own risk.
Password must be at least 8 characters long and include: one lowercase letter (a–z), one uppercase letter (A–Z), one number (0–9), and one special character (e.g., @, $, !, %, *).
Password is not in correct format. Please enter password in correct format
Password is required. Please enter a password to create a account.
Password is required. Please enter a password to login to existing account.
The specified player name has already been included. Kindly add a new player with a name that has not been added before.
Player creation failed. Please try again.
Current player is invalid. Please try to log shot again
A player report has been generated and saved to your device\'s download folder. You can view the report now or access it later in the app for future use.
The player\'s first name is missing. Kindly provide a first name to proceed.
The player\'s last name is missing. Kindly provide a first name to proceed.

We ask for read external storage permission so users can select an image from their gallery when creating or editing a player profile. This permission allows the app to access images stored on the device\'s external storage, enabling users to choose and associate images with their player profiles. Without this permission, users would not be able to select images from external storage for this feature.

We ask for read media images permission so users can select an image from their gallery when creating or editing a player profile. This permission allows the app to access the images stored on the device, enabling users to choose and associate images with their player profiles. Without this permission, users would not be able to select images from their gallery for this feature.
Permission to read external storage has been declined. To manually enable the "Read External Storage" permission and select an image from the gallery for the Player, please navigate to settings.
Permission to read media images has been declined. To manually enable the "Read Media Images" permission and select an image from the gallery for the Player, please navigate to settings.
On the settings page, you can view your account information, review terms and conditions, access app usage details, and learn about the permissions we request and why we need them.
You haven\'t recorded any successful shots. Please input the number of shots made to proceed with logging the shot.
You haven\'t recorded any missed shots. Please input the number of shots missed to proceed with logging the shot.
You haven\'t entered the date the shot was taken. Please input the date the shot was taken to proceed with logging ths shot.
This is a splash image for the splash screen that gets displayed before app is triggered

These terms and conditions ("Agreement") set forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the "Track Your Shot" mobile application ("Mobile Application" or "Service") and any of its related products and services (collectively, "Services"). This Agreement is legally binding between you ("User", "you" or "your") and Track Your Shot ("Track Your Shot", "we", "us" or "our"). If you are entering into this Agreement on behalf of a business or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity to this Agreement, in which case the terms "User", "you" or "your" shall refer to such entity. If you do not have such authority, or if you do not agree with the terms of this Agreement, you must not accept this Agreement and may not access and use the Mobile Application and Services. By accessing and using the Mobile Application and Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement. You acknowledge that this Agreement is a contract between you and Track Your Shot, even though it is electronic and is not physically signed by you, and it governs your use of the Mobile Application and Services.
Record shooting percentages for various shot types over multiple days and view the saved stats directly in the mobile app.
The image upload was unsuccessful. Please attempt it once more.
There was a error creating your account. Please try again.
There was a error deleting your account. Please try again.
This document was last updated on November 9, 2024
This email is already used for another account. Please enter a new email.
This username is already used for another account. Please enter a new username.
This username is already in use on Track Your Shot. Please use a different username.
Username is not in correct format. Please enter username in correct format
Unable to delete player. Please contact support.
We have detected a problem with your account. Please contact support to resolve issue.
We have detected currently not connected to internet. Please connect to service, and try again.
Username is required. Please enter a username to create a account.
We were able to send email verification. Please check your email to verify account
We were unable to send email verification. Please click send email verification to try again.
We were unable to set new username since the username is empty. Please click try again to set new username
We were unable to set new username since the username is the same as the current username. Please click try again to set new username
Shot report for %s has been generated. Tap to view the file.
%s has been removed from this player\'s shot history.
%s Shot has not been removed from this player\'s shot history. Please try again to remove shot.
Your player could not be retrieved. Please try again.
